snippet: The death of a swimmer and a water contamination scare cast a shadow over the Ironman triathlon in New York City on Saturday.
abstract: American Jordan Rapp wins the first Ironman US Championship in New York; death of a swimmer and a water contamination scare cast a shadow over the event.
lead_paragraph: The death of a swimmer and a water contamination scare cast a shadow over the Ironman triathlon in New York City on Saturday.

headline.seo: Swimmer’s Death Casts Shadow on Ironman Triathlon
headline.main: Shadows Over Ironman, but a Spirit of Carrying On
headline.print_headline: Shadows Over Ironman, but a Spirit of Carrying On
